comment: The topologies over a given base set form a Moore collection: the intersection of any family of them is a topology, including the empty (relative) intersection which gives the discrete topology ~ distop . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.)
